Name: Heart rate variability biofeedback training and emotion regulation
Acknowledgements: We thank our research assistants for their help with data collection: Michelle Wong, Kathryn Cassutt, Collin Amano, Yong Zhang, Paul Choi, Heekyung Rachael Kim, Seungyeon Lee, Alexandra Haydinger, Lauren Thompson, Gabriel Shih, Divya Suri, Sophia Ling, Akanksha Jain, and Linette Bagtas.
